articles.title: Kamala Harris's team criticized for using "trendy language" that backfired - i-CABLE
articles.description: Political figures sometimes use trendy language to connect with young people, but the effectiveness of this approach depends on timing. Recently, the team of former U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris has been criticized for missing the mark.

articles.title: The truth about Trump's tariff disaster that's bleeding America's economy and alienating allies
